metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4900 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in PHP where setting the environment variable PHP_CLI_SERVER_WORKERS to a large value leads to a heap buffer overflow.

notes.Note: sbeattie> PEAR issues should go against php-pear as of xenial leosilva> php7.2 in bionic and 7.4 in focal hasn't code affected. rodrigo-zaiden> affected code seems like was added in commit 82effb3f, that is included with php7.4.

criterions.comment: php7.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
